name: firefox-tab-suspender
description: A Firefox extension that automatic suspend tabs and saves memory

scripts._build_c:dev: emcc src/main/background/c/utils/array_utils/array_utils.c src/main/background/c/utils/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/services/javascript_provider/javascript_provider.c src/main/background/c/events/events.c src/main/background/c/services/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/services/event_loop/event_loop.c src/main/background/c/services/settings_provider/settings_provider.c src/main/background/c/main.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=4 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o hello.wasm -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/library.js -s ASSERTIONS=2
scripts._build_c:dist: emcc -O3 src/main/background/c/utils/array_utils/array_utils.c src/main/background/c/utils/vector/vector.c src/main/background/c/services/javascript_provider/javascript_provider.c src/main/background/c/events/events.c src/main/background/c/services/cache/cache.c src/main/background/c/services/event_loop/event_loop.c src/main/background/c/services/settings_provider/settings_provider.c src/main/background/c/main.c -s WASM=1 -s RESERVED_FUNCTION_POINTERS=4 -s EXIT_RUNTIME=1 -o hello.wasm -o src/main/background/.tmp/service.js -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["cwrap"]' --js-library src/main/background/js/library.js
scripts.build:dev: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dev && rig src/main/background/js/main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=development webpack && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
scripts.build:dist: del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp && make-dir src/main/background/.tmp && npm run _build_c:dist && rig src/main/background/js/main.js > src/main/background/.tmp/background.js && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p && del-cli -f src/main/background/.tmp
